description:
Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP: Our Attorneys Have Recovered Millions Of Dollars On Behalf Of Our Clients Throughout New England

If you or a loved one has been involved in a car crash or suffered an injury in another type of accident that was caused by the negligence of another person, you likely have questions regarding your options for protecting yourself and your family. At Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP, our goal is to help you stand up to the insurance company, hold negligent parties responsible, and ultimately secure the compensation and benefits you deserve to cover medical bills, lost wages, damages, pain and suffering, and any other expenses.

Although the insurance company may tell you that it has your best interests in mind, the truth is that it will do everything it can to protect its bottom line. Since 1999, our team of personal injury attorneys has been combining its decades of legal and professional experience helping victims secure full and fair compensation. Whether you were involved in a truck or motorcycle accident, suffered a slip and fall outside a commercial property, or had an existing condition made worse by a negligent health care provider, we are committed to fighting for your goals and interests. By emphasizing a client-first approach, we get to know you and your needs, and can offer advice and strategies tailored to you.

Each member of our staff will work hard for you, respond to your needs and fight tirelessly for your best interests when faced with any of the following:

  • Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Catastrophic injuries that may result in temporary or permanent disabilities
  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Slip and fall as well as other premises liability
  • Social Security Disability
  • Wrongful death cases

Do not hesitate to secure experienced, professional personal injury representation after an accident. During a free initial consultation, our lawyers will listen, offer practical advice and help you make an intelligent plan for moving forward. Contact us at one of our seven New England office locations in Providence, Woonsocket, Warwick and Wakefield, Rhode Island, Quincy and Lawrence, Massachusetts, and New London, Connecticut.
